parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parsing of the dataset Organizes documents as: group -> list of users user -> list of posts

        public Group parse(java.lang.String dir)

      • getXMLDocument

        org.w3c.dom.Document getXMLDocument(java.lang.String filePath)
                             throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    org.xml.sax.SAXException
        This method is used to read an XML file and parse it using DocumentBuilderFactory and DocumentBuilder from javax xml. It returns a fully parsed Document. It should be used as an input for parseFile() method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - : This is the absolute path to the XML file to read.
        Returns:
        Document : This is a W3C Dom Document object used by the getPostList() method of the parser
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - : This error is triggered when DocumentBuilderFactory fail to build the document
        java.io.IOException - : This error is triggered when the file can't be read
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - : This error is triggered when DocumentBuilder is not able to parse the Document

      • addChunks

        public Group addChunks(Group group,
                       java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Document> documents)
        Parses the given documents and integrates them to the given group, assigning them to their author. Each document constitutes a chunk.
        Parameters:
        group - the working group of users. May be expanded upon.
        documents - The list of xml documents to parse
        Returns:
        the (possibly updated) group of users with their updated chunks
        Throws:
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - In case the path can't be evaluated by Javax/Xpath, it will throw an error

        Populates an user object with values
        Parameters:
        user - a new user object
        posts - a list of posts of an user
        label - a docunit label
        writings - number of writings
        Returns:

      • getPosts

        private Posts getPosts(org.w3c.dom.NodeList nodes,
                       java.lang.String chunk,
                       java.lang.String parserType,
                       java.lang.String subjectId)
        This method is used to retrieve every post contained in one xml file and ouput them as a common.Posts object.
        Parameters:
        nodes - : Takes a NodeList of nodes
        Returns:
        : common.Posts (An object that contains a list of common.Post)

      • getPost

        Post getPost(org.w3c.dom.Element element,
             java.lang.String chunk,
             java.lang.String parserType,
             java.lang.String subjectId)
        This method takes an Element and outputs a Post object.
        Parameters:
        element - w3c element
        chunk - if existent, chunk number for post (if not, 0)
        parserType - "user" if file with user+multiple posts, "post" if file has single post
        subjectId - ID of user (if user) or author (if post)
        Returns:

        tag - html href tag
        Returns:
